short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tools to identify DOM bloat - unnecessary DOM nodes, deeply-nested elements, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visually highlights deep DOM elements, elements with 1 child, empty elements and elements without classes. Shows total DOM node count and max node depth.
